title: Bactopia pipeline parameters
description: A flexible pipeline for complete analysis of bacterial genomes

input_parameters.title: Required Parameters
input_parameters.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

fastqs.description: A FOFN with sample names and paths to FASTQ/FASTAs to process
fastqs.help: Created using `bactopia prepare`. Cannot be used with `--R1|--R2` or `--SE`

R1.description: First set of compressed (gzip) paired-end FASTQ reads (requires --R2 and --sample)
R1.help: Requires `--R2` and `--sample`. Cannot be used with `--fastqs` or `--SE` (unless `--hybrid` used).

R2.description: Second set of compressed (gzip) paired-end FASTQ reads (requires --R1 and --sample)
R2.help: Requires `--R1` and `--sample`. Cannot be used with `--fastqs` or `--SE` (unless `--hybrid` used).

SE.help: Requires `--sample`. Cannot be used with `--fastqs` or `--R1|--R2` (unless `--hybrid` used).

ont.description: Treat `--SE` as long reads for analysis. (requires --sample)

hybrid.description: Treat `--SE` as long reads for hybrid assembly.  (requires --R1, --R2, --SE and --sample)

sample.description: Sample name to use for the input sequences

accessions.description: A file containing ENA/SRA Experiment accessions or NCBI Assembly accessions to processed
accessions.header:
### For Downloading from SRA/ENA or NCBI Assembly
  **Note: Downloaded assemblies will have error free Illumina reads simulated for processing.**

accession.description: Sample name to use for the input sequences

assembly.description: A assembled genome in compressed FASTA format. (requires --sample)
assembly.help: Error-free Illumina reads will be simulated for down stream processing
assembly.header:
### For Processing an Assembly
  **Note: Assemblies will have error free Illumina reads simulated for processing.**

datasets.description: The path to datasets that have already been set up
datasets.help: Bactopia Datasets are setup using `bactopia datasets`

species.description: Name of species for species-specific dataset to use
species.help: These datasets include MLST schemas, reference genomes, protein sets, etc...

coverage.description: Reduce samples to a given coverage

genome_size.description: Expected genome size (bp) for all samples, a value of '0' will disable read error correction and read subsampling, otherwise estimate with Mash
genome_size.help: If `--species` is used, `min`, `median`, `mean`, or `max` can be used for `--genome_size`

available_datasets.description: Print a list of available datasets found based on location given by `--datasets`
